    • displayMainMenu

      void displayMainMenu()
      Displaying the whole menu including function Should be called as the Entry Point of the game 1. Start a new game startNewGame() 2. Load a save game loadGame(boolean))} 3. Exit

    • startNewGame

      private void startNewGame()
      Start a new game Prompt the user for hero's name and class choice Can update to contain input check Can update to have further character customization Updated class choice verification

    • loadASaveGame

      private void loadASaveGame(File theSaveGame)
      Currently is just a placeholder loadGame helper Load a specific save game Potential way to implementation: Call Dungeon adventure constructor to create a new state of the game with state in the save file Potential update: Use LZW or Huffman encoder\decoder to secure save files, discouraging cheating via file editing
      Parameters:
      theSaveGame - Contains the save game to load

    • loadGame

      void loadGame(boolean theOriginFromMainMenu)
      Load a save game List available save game with character name + create date or playtime
      Parameters:
      theOriginFromMainMenu - true if the origin is from main menu, false otherwise. To keep track whether gameLoop has initiated or not

    • saveGame

      void saveGame()
      Save the current state of the game The save name will be the current date and time so the player can distinguish which save game it is.
